title: Galloway on 'Post Corona: From Crisis to Opportunity'
itunes:title: Galloway on 'Post Corona: From Crisis to Opportunity'
description:
Scott Galloway, Professor of Marketing at NYU Stern School of Business, discusses his book "Post Corona: From Crisis to Opportunity."

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
